message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a chance to purchase a truly exceptional product. I believe it would be a valuable addition for you. I'm asking $300 for it. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thanks for your offer, but $300 is beyond my budget. I'm willing to pay up to $100 for the product. What do you think?
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate you taking the time to consider the product. While $100 is lower than I can accept, I'm willing to come down a bit. How about $275?
Thanks for coming down on the price, Alice. However, $275 is still out of my budget. I can go up to $120. Is that something you can work with?
I understand your budget concerns, Bob. I really want you to have this product, so I'm willing to meet you in the middle a little more. How about $250?
I appreciate your willingness to lower the price, Alice. However, $250 is still too high for me. I can increase my offer to $130. Can we meet at that price?
